titles.title: A bill to exempt Puerto Rico from the coastwise laws of the United States (commonly known as the "Jones Act").
A bill to exempt Puerto Rico from the coastwise laws of the United States (commonly known as the "Jones Act").

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 232.
